title: Error After de4dot - Application Does Not Start
content:
There is an application that has been obfuscation to learn. So in an unpack me style. In the first stage I would unpack with de4dot. After you unpack, the running application stops working.

dump and then again when I want to do the same process again stops working.

Even when I want to fix it with Universal_Fix , a result doesn't change.

When I look at the application with dnSpy , there is no problem. Codes can be read. It remains stuck in the main function when I want to run it. And it returns the following error.

That's where he hangs out.

Error returning when I want to continue.

What should I do about this?

I apologize for my bad English.

answers_data.content:
I've completed the process with a fixed version of de4dot.

Fixed version: fixed by ivancitooz

comments.text: Can you edit your answer to include what was wrong with de4dot and how you fixed it?
Sure, but I don't know the rules here. I found a fixed version through a site. If sharing is prohibited, please correct it. Fixed version:fixed by ivancitooz
